de.esoco.ewt.impl.gwt

Interface ValueFormat

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    GwtDateTimeFormat, ValueFormat.StringLengthFormat

    public interface ValueFormat
    A simple format interface that defines how to convert values objects into strings.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ValueFormat.StringLengthFormat
      A format that converts objects with the Object.toString() method but also limits the length of the string.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ValueFormat TO_STRING
      Invokes Object.toString() on input objects.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String format(java.lang.Object rValue)
      Formats a value object into a string.

    • Field Detail

      • TO_STRING

        static final ValueFormat TO_STRING
        Invokes Object.toString() on input objects.

    • Method Detail

      • format

        java.lang.String format(java.lang.Object rValue)
        Formats a value object into a string.
        Parameters:
        rValue - The value
        Returns:
        A string representing the value
